text: At War with the Army is a 1950 American musical comedy movie directed by Hal Walker and starring Dean Martin, Jerry Lewis, Mike Kellin, Angela Greene, Tommy Farrell, Polly Bergen, Danny Dayton. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was based on the play of the same name. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 musical movies Category:1950 comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:World War II movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies about the United States Army Category:Movies based on plays
title: At War with the Army
